      • linkEnvironment

        public boolean linkEnvironment(IEnvironment environment)
        Links environment with percentage Influence

        Environment can link to environment of same type (class) or one layer above

        Order from lower to upper:
        Group ---> Area ---> Location
        Specified by:
        linkEnvironment in interface IEnvironment
        Parameters:
        environment - Environment that gets linked
        Returns:
        true if it was allowed to link
